category.title: Animal in Distress
category.description: Example: Colorado fires. Animals in need of immediate help.

category.title: Boycotts
category.description: Shark fin restaurants, canned hunts, circus acts, puppy mills, fur farms, seal hunt plants, etc

category.title: Commercial Animal Operations
category.description: Businesses that make money from animal captivity; slavery, or genocide.

category.title: Disaster | Crisis | Emergency
category.description: Items needing immediate attention and help. Call to action.

category.title: Events
category.description: Add your event to the map and let the community know exactly where it's happening!

category.title: Rhino Conservation & Protection
category.description: If it's about protecting rhinos it goes here.

category.title: Puppy Mills
category.description: Unethical animal breeders and their facilities.

category.title: Seal Hunt
category.description: Mark any relevant seal hunt resource on the map. Sealing coops, processors, distributers, import/export, trade shows, retailers.

category.title: Shelters & Pounds
category.description: If they're NOT no-kill they murder pets.

category.title: Whaling - Japan
category.description: Anything to do with Japanese whaling or dolphin slaughters

category.title: Pet Stores
category.description: Any commercial operation that sells puppies.

category.title: Poaching
category.description: Critical reports, alerts, information for wildlife protection enforcement teams.

category.title: Zoos & Aquariums
category.description: Open to the public. If private, list under sanctuaries.
